divs: Sighting Detailslooked out my window checking on back yd. the object was moving toward my house. it moved to the left then to the right. its light were bright white and glowed. the bottom were red. It was moving fast. I watched it in the trees. My son also saw it. He had seen it before also.After it was over it took me a long time to go to sleep. It kind of jumped accross and lights went on and off.It was moving.
